definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret

sentences.english: The Sukhoi SU-22 is a robust and effective Soviet built ground attack aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 蘇22是前蘇聯建造的一種威力強大的對地攻擊戰機。

sentences.english: JF-17 is equipped with Russian Engine and European Avionics.
sentences.chinese: 梟龍戰機裝備的是俄羅斯引擎和歐洲的航空電子設備。

sentences.english: The war planes will be slaughtered, and their missile defense systems, over whelmed.
sentences.chinese: 這些戰機會被屠宰，他們的導彈防禦系統將被覆蓋。

sentences.english: One pilot injured, one missing after aircraft plummets at NW China air show.
sentences.chinese: 西北飛豹戰機表演時墜毀飛行員一生一失蹤。

sentences.english: The J-31 is China's second domestically produced stealth fighter.
sentences.chinese: 31是中國第二款國產隱形戰機。

sentences.english: There are three old Space Wars machines at The Caff .
sentences.chinese: 有三架舊的太空戰機在那家小餐館裏。

sentences.english: The stealth fighter is a milestone in the world history of military aviation.
sentences.chinese: 隱形戰機是世界軍事航空史上的一個里程碑。
保加利亞目前有16架米格29戰機。

sentences.english: On the Dragon’s stub-wings the 40mm ROCKET LAUNCHERS open up with a BARRAGE of leaping fire which FLASHES down and
sentences.chinese: 飛龍戰機的短翼上，40毫米火箭發射器一齊開火。

sentences.english: The aircraft can be fitted with a fixed aerial refuelling probe on the starboard side of the cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 戰機座艙的右舷可以安裝固定的空中加油受油頭。

sentences.english: The jets are thought to be moving at speeds of up to 850,000 miles an hour.
sentences.chinese: 這些戰機被認爲是在高達85萬英里的時速前進。

sentences.english: All fighters and warships of pictures area in mod.
sentences.chinese: 模組裏所有的戰機戰艦圖片資料區。

sentences.english: It is suddenly flying backward, staring directly down its barrels at the ships pursuing it.
sentences.chinese: 接着突然向後衝出，炮管直指追來的戰機。

sentences.english: Gagarin died in 1968, after crashing a MiG fighter during a training flight.
sentences.chinese: 加加林在1968年死於一次米格戰機試飛事故。

sentences.english: It takes 1 minute for the plane to overcome 14 thousand meters.
sentences.chinese: 該戰機覆蓋一萬四千米距離只用一分鐘。

sentences.english: At least two of these multi-million-dollar aircraft were set ablaze.
sentences.chinese: 這種戰機價值數億美元，至少兩架被放火焚燒。
